events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request mentions refund due to wrong item received, categorizing issue under Refund.
Support agent assigned to handle the refund request for the order with the wrong item delivered.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached photo showing the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and refund approval. I appreciate your help resolving this.
The refund case has been closed, and the customer will receive the payment back shortly.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund successfully and everything is resolved now.
This support case regarding the refund for the wrong item has now been formally closed.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on this support experience.
